an4.7:1: "Cattārome, bhikkhave, viyattā vinītā visāradā bahussutā dhammadharā dhammānudhammappaṭipannā saṅghaṁ sobhenti. Katame cattāro?
an4.7:2: Yo hoti viyatto ca visārado ca,Bahussuto dhammadharo ca hoti;Dhammassa hoti anudhammacārī,Sa tādiso vuccati saṅghasobhano.
an4.7:3: Bhikkhu ca sīlasampanno,bhikkhunī ca bahussutā;Upāsako ca yo saddho,yā ca saddhā upāsikā;Ete kho saṅghaṁ sobhenti,ete hi saṅghasobhanā"ti.
